mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pd_tc_provider_package( TC_PROVIDER_ID, PROVIDER_CODE, PROVIDER_NAME, CLASSES_CODE, CLASSES_NAME, MACHINING_CODE, MACHINING_NAME, BREED_CODE, BREED_NAME, FEATURE_CODE, FEATURE_NAME, WEIGHT_CODE, WEIGHT_NAME, WEIGHT_VAL, SALES_TARGET, MACHINING_WAY, FEATURE_FLG, NORMS_CODE, NORMS_NAME, NORMS_SUTTLE, NORMS_ERROR, NORMS_NUMBER, NORMS_SIZE, NORMS_TEXTURE, NORMS_OUT, NORMS_KG, NORMS_OUT_SIZE, NORMS_OUT_TEXTURE, NORMS_TEN, NORMS_LENGTH, NORMS_WIDTH, NORMS_HEIGHT, NORMS_VOLUME, NETWEIGHT_INNER, NETWEIGHT_OUT, APPLY_DATE, AUDIT_DATE, AUDIT_MEMO, AUDIT_STATUS, CRT_ID, CRT_TIME ) VALUE ( #{tcProviderId}, #{crtId}, #{providerName}, #{classesCode}, #{classesName}, #{machiningCode}, #{machiningName}, #{breedCode}, #{breedName}, #{featureCode}, #{featureName}, #{weightCode}, #{weightName}, #{weightVal}, #{salesTarget}, #{machiningWay}, #{featureFlg}, #{normsCode}, #{normsName}, #{normsSuttle}, #{normsError}, #{normsNumber}, #{normsSize}, #{normsTexture}, #{normsOut}, #{normsKg}, #{normsOutSize}, #{normsOutTexture}, #{normsTen}, #{normsLength}, #{normsWidth}, #{normsHeight}, #{normsVolume}, #{netweightInner}, #{netweightOut}, #{applyDate}, #{auditDate}, #{auditMemo}, #{auditStatus}, #{crtId}, SYSDATE() )
